entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
